column4: For any reason everytime I click on the text box for Irssi and type in "F" it doesn't type in the text box, but rather goes to the "Find" tab.
what search option? i don't see it?
are you using a terminal emulator like gnome-terminal, or are you tty'ed in via control alt f1, for instance?
is there a way we could get a screen shot of this?

if you hit print screen, or prtsc on the top right of your keyboard, you should get an option for screenshot. or if you hear a camera shutter sound, it automatically saved it to /home/tasmania/Pictures/
how is the screenshot coming along?
you seem to fix your problems better than we can. :)
not me. I am always glad to help.:)
I can't DCC send exploit, sorry.
it was just a cute little picture i made with cowsay.
maybe they aren't set with a default app? like gedit?
ohh, never mind. no, the image i was trying to send you is a png.
yeah, you can open .txt with gedit.
yeah, if you right click a file, then choose properties, you can set a default app to open it.
